title: Servers and in game
body: I usually sit on 20-23 ping/ms per game but every 10 mins the game randomly crashes and causes me to either have to shut down lol re-open it, re-download or restart my computer, and by the time I do these things the games over or my team has given up. Also when it tries to make me play on the legacy client the launcher doesn't even open. Any tips or assistance cause this is just pathetic and annoying

replies.body:
I have been encountering this myself since the last patch. doesn't happen every game. ran a constant ping for the entirety of last game, dc'ed twice, but had no change to personal ping.
reminds me of the old days of lol where 1 week per month was unplayable due to some server error
